column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I've tired a few of Chicago's famous deep dish pizza spots and this my favorite. The salad left something to be desired
column2: but I didn't really come for the greens. I ordered a deep dish pizza with sausage and pepperoni. It came out in about 45 minutes and was absolutely delicious. The cheese was perfectly melted
column3: the sausage wasn't too spicy and the sauce tasted very fresh. This is my new go to deep dish pizzeria.
